tool.name: K-Means Clustering for Grids
tool.description: This tool implements the K-Means cluster analysis for grids in two variants, iterative minimum distance (Forgy 1965) and hill climbing (Rubin 1967).

param.name: MAXITER
param.label: Maximum Iterations
param.help: maximum number of iterations, ignored if set to zero (default)

param.name: NORMALISE
param.label: Normalise
param.help: Automatically normalise grids by standard deviation before clustering.

param.name: RGB_COLORS
param.label: Update Colors from Features
param.help: Use the first three features in list to obtain blue, green, red components for class colour in look-up table.
